af point selection: Manual selection using FlexiZone AF/AE, Size (Normal, Small)
af system points: AiAF (Face Detection / 9-point), 1-point AF (Any position is available or fixed centre)
batteries: 2x Size-AA Alkaline or NiMH Batteries (NB4-300) (Alkalines supplied)
battery life: ¹ Using the batteries and memory card format supplied with the camera, except where indicated

Approx. 140 shots¹ (with supplied batteries)
Approx. 400 shots (with optional Canon NB-3AH batteries)¹
Approx. 540 min. playback (with supplied batteries)
Approx. 660 min. playback (with Canon NB-3AH batteries)
closest focusing distance: 1cm (W) from front of lens in macro
construction: 9 elements in 7 groups (including 1 double-sided aspherical element)
continuous shooting: Approx. 1.3 shots/sec.¹ (until memory card becomes full)²

¹ Under conditions where the flash does not fire
² Depending on memory card speed / capacity
flash exposure compensation: +/- 2 EV in 1/3 stop increments. Face Detection FE. Safety FE.

Conversion Lens Adapter, LA-DC58G
Tele-converter 1.75x TC-DC58N,
Wide-converter 0.7x WC-DC58N
Close-up lens 250D (58mm)

metering modes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre or linked to Face Detection AF or FlexiZone AF frame)
modes: Auto, Program AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual, Portrait, Landscape, Night Snapshot, Kids & Pets, Indoor, Stitch Assist, Movie, Special Scene (Night Scene, Foliage, Snow, Beach, Fireworks, Aquarium, Underwater)
movie length: ¹ Depending on memory card speed / capacity
my camera: Start-up image and camera sounds customisation (Pre-Installed items only)
photo effects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Custom Color (limited))
power supply battery chargers: Battery Charger Kit CBK4-300, Ni-MH Batteries NB4-300, AC Adapter Kit ACK800
still image type: JPEG compression, (Exif 2.2 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
waterproof weatherproof case: Waterproof case WP-DC16, Waterproof Case Weight WW-DC1
zoom: Optical 6x. Digital approx. 4x (with Digital Tele-Converter approx. 1.6x or 2.0x and Safety Zoom¹)². Combined approx. 24x
